name: Pick Bonus
description:
Pick Bonuses are are a type of small bonus rounds for casino-type games.

The denomination is how much you're betting.

Click on the left or right arrow to decrease or increase your bet respectively.

When you have decided your bet click on play to get started.

After the play button is pressed, you may click on a chest to guess which chest contains money, which will be added on to your balance once you have clicked on a pooper chest.

Pooper chests end your round and contain no money.

If you receive a 0x multiplier, you will not receive any money as well.

Multiplier Probability:

50% chance for {0x}

30% chance for {1x, 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 6x, 7x, 8x, 9x, 10x}

15% chance for {12x, 16x, 24x, 32x, 48x, 64x}

5% chance for {100x, 200x, 300x, 400x, 500x}

If you're feeling generous, feel free to donate to my PayPal.
